```{r}
library(readr)
songs1 <- read_csv("B1/songs1.csv")

library(readr)

library(readr)
users1 <- read_csv("B1/users1.csv")

library(readr)
users2 <- read_csv("B1/users2.csv")
```


```{r}

library(tidyverse)
##Q1
##exercise1

result<- users1 %>%
group_by(world_id)%>%
summarise(n = n())

prop<- prop.table(result$n)
tibble(World_id=c("social","indep"),
prop=prop
)

##exercise1
result2<- users2 %>%
group_by(world_id)%>%
summarise(n = n())

prop2<- prop.table(result2$n)
tibble(World_id=c("social","indep"),
prop=prop2
)
```
